cu.explanation_en: Setting the global log level to an invalid enum 'invalid' will cause logging configuration failure and potential system instability.

du.explanation_en: Setting prach_ConfigurationIndex to an out-of-range value (1000) will cause invalid PRACH configuration and RACH procedure failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 prach_ConfigurationIndex 設定為超出範圍的值 (1000)，會導致無效的 PRACH 配置，並造成 RACH 程序失敗。
